title: Which Rengar skin should I get
body: I have 1000 RP and i am looking to buy a skin for rengar. Which one should i get Headhunter or Nighthunter?

replies.body: [Here](http://www.lolking.net/models/?champion=107&skin=0), this will give you a 3-D view of the skins so you can decide which one you like :)
Take a coin Head = Headhunter Tails = Night Hunter.
